short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes the chat to the bottom of the player. Useful for a small window. Fills the remaining height space of the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to use :

1. Go to a twitch livestream
2. Reduce the windows width (works at it's best at ~700px). 
3. Click on the extension icon. The chat will fit the remaining vertical space of the page.
4. GG

Optional : You can chose to hide the stream infos banner by navigating through the option page of the extension. Options will be automatically saved for your next visit.
